name: Encarmine Vortex
description:
The next time this character acts, they will immediately use their Skill: Deal 3 Pyro DMG and remove Shield.
While preparing this Skill: Grant 3 Shield points to the character to which this is attached.
descriptionraw: The next time this character acts, they will immediately use their Skill: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Deal 3 $[K103] and remove $[K6]</color>.\nWhile preparing this Skill: Grant 3 $[K6] points to the character to which this is attached.
descriptionreplaced: The next time this character acts, they will immediately use their Skill: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Deal 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> and remove {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color></color>.\nWhile preparing this Skill: Grant 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points to the character to which this is attached.
